arts.ttl: Stevenage 'bitten in the bum' in 2-1 loss at Peterborough
arts.sum: Boro didn't clear and Kwame Poku guided the loose ball through a crowd of players for a 2-1 Posh win. It meant the answer to why Stevenage had come away from nothing was an easy one to explain for the Boro boss.

arts.ttl: Kwame Poku nets stoppage-time winner as Peterborough edge Stevenage
arts.sum: It was the Posh’s first win in four games.

arts.ttl: Stevenage beaten 2-1 with last kick at Peterborough United
arts.sum: A second goal in a week from Louis Thompson had seemingly rescued a point for Boro, who had fallen behind on five minutes when Donay O'Brien-Brady was given way too much time to find the bottom corner. Nathan Thompson put in a block at the back post that was not needed, the linesman flagging for a goal kick, but before the decision could be made, the defender was down and Lewis Freestone was stripped for action immediately.

arts.ttl: Stevenage's Alex Revell on importance of Peterborough trip
arts.sum: "I think the new players probably realised what you have to do to play for this club and this team and get a result away from home, how hard you have to work. "With that competition for places, people now know that if they don't perform, and even if they do, they still might not play because it might not be the right team that to play in a certain game."

arts.ttl: One injury setback for Stevenage but good news on another
arts.sum: Louis Appere has been missing since the 0-0 draw away to Burton Albion in August while Aaron Pressley picked up an ankle injury against Coventry City in pre-season that needed surgery. "He’s working extremely hard too, one of the first players in and the last out so if anyone deserves to come back and be in a good place and to how what he's about, it’s Pres.

arts.ttl: 6 things spotted as Stevenage beat Wrexham 1-0 in League One
arts.sum: That is 10 games into the league season and a perfect time to take stock of how things are going. But to do it on the back of winning at home to Charlton, and with another clean sheet, and in the manner they did, opposition managers will be watching the video with trepidation and coming out the other end with a sense of foreboding.

arts.ttl: Peterborough United man attracted ‘little interest’ in the summer transfer window, report suggests
arts.sum: Peterborough United defender Romoney Crichlow attracted ‘little interest’ over the summer, as detailed in a report by the… The post Peterborough United man attracted ‘little interest’ in the summer transfer window, report suggests appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Preview: Peterborough United vs. Stevenage - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Peterborough United and Stevenage, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
